content.rendered: Housed in a unique ceramic hexagon engraved by the 13th Imaemon Imaizumi, an artist who’s considered a living national treasure in Japan. This is a single bottle from a limited series of 150 bottles. Expect persimmon, plum, aged honey and a light, crisp citrus finish. This collection comes with a beautiful box presentation.

excerpt.rendered:
Distillery: Suntory
Whisky Origin: Japanese
Single Malt: Yes
Blended: No
Grain: No
Alcohol Strength: 43%
Bottle Size: 70cl
Weight: 3.5 Kg
